Long T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front and a slightly deeper neckline.
Long T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front and a slightly deeper neckline.
Long T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front and a slightly deeper neckline.

Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar decorated with sequins and sparkly plastic beads, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, and short slits in the sides.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.

Calf-length dress in twill made from a viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Seam under the bust with elastication at the back, and short, wide sleeves.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Seam under the bust with elastication at the back, and short, wide sleeves.
Tunic in soft jersey with a round neck, short dolman sleeves, a narrow adjustable tie belt under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Leather shoes with open lacing and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with round toes, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in jersey with a layer of sequined mesh over the top. Elasticated waist and shaping seams at the sides for best fit.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy. Jacket with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket, flap welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist, pleats at the top, fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Sleeveless long dress in crinkled satin and lace with a deep V-neck, small frills at the shoulders and waist, and a narrow opening and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless long dress in crinkled satin and lace with a deep V-neck, small frills at the shoulders and waist, and a narrow opening and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Vest top in airy jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes.
Vest top in airy jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw-edge hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw-edge hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw-edge hem.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with deep armholes.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with deep armholes.

Desert boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front and decorative welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm. The boots are made partly from recycled polyester.
Blucher shoes in shiny imitation leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles that are patterned underneath. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with terry hearts on the front, buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
